attributes.action: Ensure that all those professionals whose catalogue of errors led to the tragic death of Baby P are held accountable for their actions and that a full independent enquiry by the Children's Commisioner is launched immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eight years after the death of Victoria Climbie the law created to stop this happening again has failed to prevent a similar tragedy in the same borough. This baby boy's death must not be in vain. These professionals need to be taken to account for their lack of care and the tragic circumstances that were the result of it.
Please forward this petition to all your friends and colleagues or to anybody who cares.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
